margin--r-none.title: No right margin
margin--r-none.description: Removes all margin from the right.

margin--r-xs.title: Tiny right margin
margin--r-xs.description: Adds a tiny amount of margin to the right.

margin--r-sm.title: Small right margin
margin--r-sm.description: Adds a small amount of margin to the right.

margin--r-md.title: Medium right margin
margin--r-md.description: Adds a medium amount of margin to the right.

margin--r-lg.title: Large right margin
margin--r-lg.description: Adds a large amount of margin to the right.

margin--r-xl.title: Extra-large right margin
margin--r-xl.description: Adds an extra-large amount of margin to the right.

margin--r-xxl.title: Double-extra-large right margin
margin--r-xxl.description: Adds a double-extra-large amount of margin to the right.
